[DQC.US.0163.10085] A value of 16,200,000 has been reported for the concept us-gaap:PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipment. This represents additions to PPE and is used in the segment note as a descendant of a segment reporting table us-gaap:ScheduleOfSegmentReportingInformationBySegmentTable. When reporting additions to long lived assets in the segment disclosure the element SegmentExpenditureAdditionToLongLivedAssets should be used even if the value is the same as the additions to PPE.
